include: current_power_usage.last {alias: R3 Left Home Computer Monitor}
current_power_usage.last {alias: R4 Right Home Computer Monitor}

panels.title: Strip Power Usage by Power Strip (Watts)
Strip Power Usage Stacked by Power Strip (Watts)
Plug Power Usage Stacked by Plug (Watts)

targets.query: SELECT mean("value") FROM "current_power_usage" WHERE ("alias" = 'L3 Mac Mini' OR "alias" = 'L4 MacBook Pro Dock' OR "alias" = 'R1 Home Computer') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($kdb_interval), "alias" fill(null)
